get.description: Redirect to Todoist OAuth.
Handle Todoist OAuth callback.
Redirect to Google OAuth. Set write_scope=true to request calendar write access.
Handle Google OAuth callback.
Clear session and redirect to home.

post.description: Disconnect Todoist by removing the stored token.

schema.title: Response Disconnect Todoist Auth Todoist Disconnect Post

get.description: Demo login - bypasses Google OAuth for testing/previews.

post.description: Reset demo user data back to initial seed state.

get.description: Get all projects.

schema.title: Response Get Projects Api V1 Projects Get

get.description: Get calendar events for enabled calendars.

schema.title: Response Get Events Api V1 Events Get

get.description: Get all available calendars with their enabled status.

schema.title: Response Get Calendars Api V1 Calendars Get

post.description: Toggle a calendar's enabled status.
Set which calendars are enabled (from wizard).

get.description: Get tasks with optional filtering.

schema.title: Response List Tasks Api V1 Tasks Get

post.description: Create a new task.

get.description:
Get all task titles/descriptions and domain names for the user.

Used by the client when enabling/disabling encryption to encrypt/decrypt
all data in a single batch operation.
Get a single task by ID.

post.description: Restore an archived task back to pending status.
Complete a non-recurring task.
Uncomplete a task (mark as pending).

Toggle a task's completion status.

For recurring tasks, this toggles the instance for the specified date
(or today if no date provided).

Batch update task content (title and description).

Used when enabling encryption (to save encrypted content) or
disabling encryption (to save decrypted content).

**Non-Atomic Behavior:** Commits in batches of 25 to prevent connection
timeouts on cloud databases (Railway, etc). If an error occurs mid-batch,
previously committed batches remain persisted. The operation is idempotent -
retry to complete any remaining tasks.

Returns:
    - updated_count: Number of tasks successfully updated
    - total_requested: Total tasks in request
    - errors: List of {id, error} for failed tasks (only if any failed)

get.description: Get all domains for the current user.

schema.title: Response List Domains Api V1 Domains Get

post.description: Create a new domain.

get.description: Get a single domain by ID.

post.description:
Batch update domain names.

Used when enabling encryption (to save encrypted names) or
disabling encryption (to save decrypted names).

Commits after each item to prevent connection timeouts.
Returns count of domains updated.

get.description: Get current user's preferences (creates defaults if missing).

Get encryption status for current user.

Returns whether encryption is enabled and the salt (if enabled).
The salt is needed client-side to derive the decryption key.

post.description:
Set up E2E encryption for the user.

The client generates a salt and derives an encryption key from the passphrase.
The client encrypts a known test value ("WHENDOIST_ENCRYPTION_TEST") and sends
both the salt and encrypted test value to the server.

This endpoint stores the salt and test value, and marks encryption as enabled.

Disable E2E encryption for the user.

WARNING: This does NOT decrypt existing data. Encrypted data will remain
encrypted but unreadable without the original passphrase.

To properly disable encryption:
1. Export all data (backup)
2. Disable encryption
3. Import data back (unencrypted)

Get WebAuthn registration options for creating a new passkey.

The browser uses these options with navigator.credentials.create().

Verify the WebAuthn registration response and store the passkey.

After navigator.credentials.create() returns, the client sends the
credential along with the PRF salt and encrypted test value.

Get WebAuthn authentication options for unlocking with a passkey.

Also returns the PRF salt and test value for the first passkey.
The browser uses these options with navigator.credentials.get().

Verify the WebAuthn authentication response.

Returns the PRF salt and wrapped key for the authenticated passkey.
The client unwraps this to get the master encryption key.

get.description:
Get PRF data for a specific credential ID.

This is used when the browser already knows which credential was used
and needs to look up the corresponding PRF salt and wrapped key.
List all passkeys for the current user.

delete.description:
Delete a passkey.

Note: Cannot delete the last passkey if no passphrase fallback is configured.

get.description: Get task instances for a date range.

schema.title: Response List Instances Api V1 Instances Get

post.description: Complete a specific instance of a recurring task.
Uncomplete a specific instance of a recurring task.
Toggle an instance's completion status.
Skip a specific instance of a recurring task.
Unskip a specific instance (revert skip, mark as pending).
Complete all pending instances for a task before a given date.

get.description: Count pending instances from past days across all tasks.

post.description: Complete or skip all pending past instances across all tasks.

get.description:
Export all user data as a JSON file.

Returns a downloadable JSON file with all tasks, domains, and preferences.

post.description:
Import user data from a backup JSON file.

WARNING: This will replace all existing data!

get.description: List all snapshots with enabled state.

post.description: Create a manual snapshot.

get.description: Download a snapshot as a JSON file.

post.description: Restore user data from a snapshot.

Delete all tasks and domains for the current user.

This is a destructive operation for testing purposes.
No external service connection required.

get.description:
Preview what will be imported from Todoist.

Returns counts and project list without actually importing anything.

post.description:
Import all projects and tasks from connected Todoist account.

Creates domains from Todoist projects and tasks with their attributes.
Skips items that have already been imported (tracked by external_id).

get.description: Return version and commit info for the running instance.
Check if wizard has been completed.

post.description: Mark wizard as completed.
Reset wizard to allow re-running.

get.description: Get current Google Calendar sync status.

post.description:
Enable Google Calendar sync.

If the user's token doesn't have write scope, returns a re-auth URL.
If scope is OK, creates the "Whendoist" calendar and runs initial sync.
Disable Google Calendar sync. Optionally delete all synced events.
Trigger a full re-sync of all tasks (runs in background).

get.description: Return current user info for the SPA shell.
Return comprehensive analytics data for the specified time range.
Return most recently completed tasks.

schema.title: Response Get Recent Completions Api V1 Analytics Recent Completions Get

get.description: Return the CSRF token for the current session.
